# TASK::TASK_FORCE_MOTION_STATE

## Summary
Task to the peds motion state so it can be sequenced

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **INT** motionState
* **BOOL** forceRestart = false

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
p2 always false

[30/03/2017] ins1de :

See FORCE_PED_MOTION_STATE
